text: Adobe Express (Adobe Spark) is a free online platform for designed for Video Editors and Photo Editors to edit their videos, photos, PDF & other Files in a professional way. It offers a wide range of free templates of videos, graphics and web pages. It provides access to the huge library of designs including fonts, images and icons. == Video Editing Guide == Adobe Express offers a user-friendly video editing guide that allow users to create professional videos. It provides complete video editing tutorial step by step to create videos, adding fonts, images, other icons. With this guide you can trim your videos, add transitions and other effects to your videos. In addition to this, it offers a wide range of free templates including videos, fonts and images. == Reference == Category:Adobe software
title: Adobe Express
